column8:
Fender Stratocaster http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fender_Stratocaster A piece of design so successful that its name, Stratocaster, more popularly shortened to “Strat”, has come to describe any solid bodied electric guitar whether or not it is made by Fender.

Broadly played by just about every guitarist you have heard of and probably all those whose names you cannot remember.  Certainly played very well last night, 14 July 2009, by Steve Winwood http://www.stevewinwood.com/in Leamington Spa, most notably in the solo that is a feature of his song Dirty City from his album Nine Lives.  Clapton does the honours on the CD but without being ungracious Clapton was not missed last night.
column21: T shirt admiring the Strat, one of the most famous and beloved guitars - musical instruments - of all time
